name: hello-world
description: This Template generates an (Node.js) Express Webserver and serves a p5.js Sketch. The 'Dockerfile' handles containerization process and exposes the port 8085. The 'docker-compose.yml' deploys the stack of containers. A Loadbalancer for accessing and scale the service is inside the stack. The 'rancher-compose.yml' connects both containers p5js and loadbalancer
